titleStmt.title: Here begynneth y[e] hystory of Tytus & Gesyppus translated out of Latyn into Englysshe by Wyllyam Walter, somtyme seruaunte to Syr Henry Marney ...
titleStmt.author: Boccaccio, Giovanni, 1313-1375.
Walter, William, fl. 1520.

publicationStmt.publisher: Enprynted at London in Fletestrete at the synge of the Sonne by me Wynkyn de Worde,

notesStmt.note: Date of imprint suggested by STC (2nd ed.).
"From the Decameron, 10th day, tale 8"--Cf. STC (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in the British Library.

place.placeName: London in Fletestrete at the synge of the Sonne
